title: SOCIAL MEDIA POSTING
job_overview:
We’re hiring long-term social media content posters  to build and maintain high-quality social media accounts.

- If you know how to create natural posts and comments that don’t get flagged — JOIN US
- If you know how to make accounts look human and trusted — JOIN US
- If you want stable, consistent work and potential for growth — JOIN US
- If you're familiar with niche subs, trends, and growth hacks — JOIN US

Workers with Iphones are preffered for this job.


To apply to this job,
Fill out this application seriously:

Upgrade to see actual info

After filling it out Upgrade to see actual info with “POSTER DONE”  .
